help-file.title: "SENSE HOLINESS"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Protection
"Sense Holiness" grants the recipient the ability to detect who is holy and who is not. "Holy" is defined as being of a religious order and pure of spirit, whether that spirit is purely good or evil.
